explains: n. 坏事；不道德的行为

sentences.en: The bank hotly denies any wrongdoing.
sentences.cn: 该银行强烈否认任何违规行为。

sentences.en: The city attorney's office hasn't found any evidence of criminal wrongdoing.
sentences.cn: 市律师事务所还没有发现任何犯罪行为的证据。

sentences.en: Level Global and Loch saw investors redeem money as soon as possible because of the raid, even though they haven't been charged with any wrongdoing.
sentences.cn: 目前水平国际和 Loch 公司看到投资者因为此次突袭而尽快赎回资金，尽管他们没有受到任何不当行为的指控。
